document.full_text: two men were arrested for allegedly stealing two sets of elk antlers with a combined value of more than $500,000 from an exhibitor at the national rifle association's annual convention over the weekend, authorities said on tuesday.
document.title: arrests made in theft of $500,000 elk antlers at nra
lines_and_colors: two men were arrested for allegedly stealing two sets of elk antlers with a combined value of more than $500,000 from an exhibitor at the national rifle association's annual convention over the weekend, authorities said on tuesday.
